member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.AdminController.CreateNewElection
member.summary: create new election with information of election description and candidates information (cannot be updated after creation) (you can add voters after creation)

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.AdminController.AddVotersToElection
member.summary: send list of voters email for the specified election email and hashed password will automatically send to added voter manually

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.AdminController.DeleteVoterFromElection
member.summary: delete specified voter from the election

member.name: M:WebAPI.DataAccess.SqlServerDataAccess.IsAdminLoginValid(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: returns admin id if login is valid, return 0 if login is not valid
